R

remove(int, int) - Method in class NestedMap
Returns the CardPlacement Object stored at the x,y position and removes it the HashMap
requiredItem - Variable in class CardGolden
If not null, specifies the item to be used as multiplier for the points awarded to the player.
requiredItems - Variable in class ObjectiveItem
Map containing the required resources to satisfy the objective.
The Keys of the map are the items and the Values are the number of units required.
requiredResources - Variable in class ObjectiveResource
Map containing the required resources to satisfy the objective.
The Keys of the map are the resources and the Values are the number of units required.
requiresCorner - Variable in class CardGolden
If the field is true then the card will multiply the number of points it will give out by the number of corners being covered when placing it.
requiresCorner() - Method in class CardGolden
Returns value of the requiresCorner flag.
resource - Variable in class CardResource
Indicates the type of resource this card represents.
It is used by the GUI and CLI to determine the color of the card.
If the card is played Face-down, the card will give the player 1 unit of the resource stated in the field.
resource - Variable in class Corner
Describes which resource is contained in the corner.
Resource - Enum Class in Unnamed Package
Enum class that contains all allowed types of Resources.
Other objects will reference this class when dealing with Resources.
Resource() - Constructor for enum class Resource
 
RESOURCE - Enum constant in enum class CornerType
 
resourceCardVisible1 - Variable in class Game
First visible Resource Card.
resourceCardVisible2 - Variable in class Game
Second visible Resource Card.
resourcesDeck - Variable in class Game
Stores the current deck of Resource Cards.
roundsCompleted - Variable in class Game
Stores number of rounds completed by the table.
Does not count the round in progress
roundsCompleted - Variable in class Player
Field storing the number of rounds completed by the player.
